official_title: A bill to amend the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to require the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to give primary consideration to project quality in making grants under the urban development action grant program.

summary.text: Amends the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to eliminate the requirement that applicant economic distress be considered the primary criterion in the selection of recipients of urban development action grants.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to require the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to give primary consideration to project quality in making grants under the urban development action grant program.
